entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
